item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. ESO telescope captures the most detailed infrared map of the Milky Way (9 points | discuss)
2. Boris Vallejo and the pixel art of the demoscene (309 points | 78 comments)
3. Bop Spotter (2072 points | 339 comments)
4. Multiversion Python Thoughts (64 points | 37 comments)
5. "Comedy is search" – theory on how jokes work (37 points | 16 comments)
6. Show HN: qrframe – generate beautiful qr codes with javascript code (265 points | 40 comments)
7. UK workers must keep all customer tips under new law (14 points | 23 comments)
8. Ask HN: Should you reply STOP to unwanted texts? (104 points | 122 comments)
9. PyTorch Native Architecture Optimization: Torchao (124 points | 32 comments)
10. Matrix-Libera IRC Bridge Temporary Shutdown, a Retrospective (2023) (56 points | 34 comments)
11. Autarc (YC S24) Is Hiring a Software Engineer to Fight Climate Change ( | hide)
12. Essential node in global semiconductor supply chain hit by Hurricane Helene (105 points | 26 comments)
13. MusicBrainz: An open music encyclopedia (337 points | 71 comments)
14. Show HN: Facad – A colorful directory listing tool for the command line (111 points | 74 comments)
15. Show HN: Venator – Open-source threat detection (47 points | discuss)
16. Vanishing Culture: Preserving Cookbooks (102 points | 66 comments)
17. Launch HN: Inkeep (YC W23) – Copilot for Support (think Cursor for help desks) (108 points | 55 comments)
18. The Case of the Missing Increment (32 points | 4 comments)
19. California bans legacy admissions at private universities (467 points | 492 comments)
20. Phrase matching in Marginalia Search (167 points | 20 comments)
21. Show HN: A macOS app to prevent sound quality degradation on AirPods (180 points | 233 comments)
22. Sea robins use leg-like fins to taste, navigate seafloor, researchers discover (3 points | discuss)
23. Ask HN: Any good essays/books/advice about software sales? (175 points | 68 comments)
24. BorgBackup 2.0 supports Rclone – over 70 cloud providers in addition to SSH (197 points | 63 comments)
25. Do AI companies work? (350 points | 353 comments)
26. Do All Problems Have Technical Fixes? (54 points | 43 comments)
27. Keep Track: 3D Satellite Toolkit (165 points | 36 comments)
28. AI chipmaker Cerebras files for IPO (190 points | 102 comments)
29. New, unique fusion reactor comes together due to global research collaboration (5 points | 1 comment)
30. Fix photogrammetry bridges so that they are not "solid" underneath (2020) (57 points | 18 comments)
